name: CMMS Codespace
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y docker && sudo curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.29.2/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose && sudo service docker start && docker-compose up -d
